data.comment: Today's referee, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea, has blown to start the match.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Real Madrid's Karim Benzema has run offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Betis.
Real Madrid's Ferland Mendy breaks free at Benito Villamarin. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Betis at Benito Villamarin.
In the minute 7, Betis push forward at Benito Villamarin and Antonio Sanabria gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Real Madrid defence.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Betis.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Emerson for Betis has been booked by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 13, Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Betis territory.
Federico Valverde scores to make it 0-1 at Benito Villamarin.
Great play from Karim Benzema to set up the goal.
In the minute 15, Real Madrid's Sergio Ramos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Betis a goal kick.
Betis have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nabil Fekir of Betis gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 20, Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Betis have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Betis.
In the minute 24, Betis's Guido Rodriguez misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Betis are pushing forward but Antonio Sanabria's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Betis at Benito Villamarin.
Can Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Madrid's half?
Free kick Betis.
In the minute 28, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Betis.
Goal kick for Betis at Benito Villamarin.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 32, Real Madrid needs to be cautious. Betis have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
In the minute 35, Goal! Aissa Mandi (Betis) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Sergio Canales instrumental with a fine assist.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through William Carvalho.
Nabil Fekir with an assist there.
Free kick for Real Madrid in the half of Betis.
In the minute 40, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Real Madrid just outside Betis's area.
Guido Rodriguez is booked for the home team.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Betis a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Real Madrid are caught offside.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 42, Real Madrid will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Betis.
Dani Carvajal (Real Madrid) gets a yellow card.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
In the minute 45, Karim Benzema gets his shot on target but fails to score for Real Madrid.
Free kick Betis.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
The first-half has ended.
Luka Modric is replacing Toni Kroos for the away team.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea has blown to start the second-half.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a Betis throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
Throw-in for Betis in the half of Real Madrid.
In the minute 46, Real Madrid make their second substitution with Isco replacing Martin Odegaard.
In the minute 47, Real Madrid are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Benito Villamarin.
In the minute 48, Emerson is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
Dani Carvajal instrumental with a fine assist.
So close for Real Madrid as Karim Benzema's shot comes back off the post.
In the minute 53, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Real Madrid's Luka Modric has been booked in Seville.
Betis are whistled for offside.
In the minute 54, In Seville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Betis are pushing forward but Nabil Fekir's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
In the minute 56, Can Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Madrid's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
Free kick for Betis in the half of Real Madrid.
In the minute 60, Throw-in high up the field for Betis in Seville.
Can Betis capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Madrid's half?
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a throw-in for Betis, close to Real Madrid's area.
In the minute 63, Cristian Tello is on a sub for Joaquin for Betis.
Corner awarded to Betis.
Emerson (Betis) has been sent off!
In the minute 68, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Real Madrid close to the penalty box.
Sergio Ramos for Real Madrid gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Betis a goal kick.
Goal kick for Betis at Benito Villamarin.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Antonio Sanabria with Martin Montoya.
Throw-in Betis.
In the minute 72, Zinedine Zidane is making the team's third substitution at Benito Villamarin with Borja Mayoral replacing Luka Jovic.
Betis to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
The home team replace Nabil Fekir with Loren Moron.
In the minute 75, Real Madrid drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
Real Madrid drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 78, Betis have a goal kick.
An attacking Real Madrid player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
At Benito Villamarin, Marc Bartra has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 82, Goal! Real Madrid take a 2-3 lead thanks to a Sergio Ramos spot-kick..
Sergio Canales (Betis) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 87, Real Madrid are caught offside.
Real Madrid advance rapidly upfield but Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea blows for offside.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At Benito Villamarin the fourth official shows that 8 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Real Madrid are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in the half of Betis.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Betis.
Throw-in for Betis close to the penalty box.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Betis's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Seville Real Madrid attack through Karim Benzema. The finish is off target, however.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Betis a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 2-3.
Aissa Mandi (Betis) has received a first yellow card.
